description:
An open-source ebook reader designed for immersive and deep reading experiences.

Readest is a modern, feature-rich ebook reader designed for avid readers offering seamless cross-platform access, powerful tools, and an intuitive interface to elevate your reading experience.
Release Highlight
- TTS: Added desktop common media control support when TTS is playing
- PDF: Disabled swipe-up gesture for toggling the action bar when zoomed in
- Fonts: Fixed an issue where embedded fonts in ebooks were occasionally not applied
- Reader: Fixed an issue where newly created highlights sometimes would not appear
- Reader: Enabled scrolling in the menu when the menu is too long
What's Changed
- fix: disable swipe up to toggle action bar for PDF zoomed in by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2068
- tts: support media session in desktop apps by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2071
- fix: handle invalid bookkey for viewState, closes #2073 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2074
- fix(layout): scroll in the dropdown menu in landscape mode, closes #2072 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2076
- Update translation.json by @StepanSad in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2078
- css: default to lower font-family specificity than the styles defined inside the ebook, closes #2070 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2081
- release(hotfix): version 0.9.81 by @chrox in https://github.com/readest/readest/pull/2082
Full Changelog: https://github.com/readest/readest/compare/v0.9.80...v0.9.81
